The Sater Group Portfolio of Luxury Homes

The complete portfolio of luxury homes from The Sater Group is quite extensive. With over 35 years of designing award-winning luxury home we have quite a lot of homes to preview. This photo collection of our custom home designs represents just a small fraction of the countless award winning luxury homes we have designed for our clients nationally and worldwide .

LUXURY CUSTOM HOME PROJECTS

Remember, we can design a custom luxury home just for you. If you would like to choose a luxury home plan from our extensive stock home plans portfolio visit our Sater Design Collection website where you can choose from more than 450 plans.
